hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: UPLOAD_EC2
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Upload image to EC2 on a successful build

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BUNDLE_TOOLS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Bundle guest tools for VMware and Virtualbox

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For recovering a failed build, leave blank by default for new builds

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: For recovering a failed build, leave blank by default for new builds

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd /mnt export BUILD_ID=$BUILD_ID export BUILD_DIR=$BUILD_DIR export BUILD_NAME=$BUILD_NAME export UPLOAD_EC2=$UPLOAD_EC2 if [ "$BUNDLE_TOOLS" = "true" ] then bundletools="-t" fi sudo -E /opt/vappio-util/vp-build $bundletools $IMAGE_NAME qiime if [ $? = 0 ] %26%26 [ "$UPLOAD_EC2" = "true" ] then bldimgname=`echo "$BUILD_ID" | sed 's/_/-/'` curl http://localhost:8888/job/Bundle%20ec2%20image/buildWithParameters?IMAGE_NAME=/mnt/qiime-$bldimgname fi
